settings.sub_heading: The Biotechnology Of Our Natural Skincare
settings.desc_heading: Good microbes are our skin's best friends. We have trillions of microbes on our skin, many of which are beneficial. A well-balanced skin microbiome is vital to skin health. When our skin microbiome is out of balance and lacking certain good microbes, issues like Eczema can flare up.
settings.desc_heading_two: The good news is that feeding your skin microbiome with the right ingredients can help your skin regain a healthy balance. The SkinBiome Co.'s products contain our proprietary active ingredient: Dermafixium, which does exactly that!

settings.desc_heading:
Our skin is our largest organ, and it's teeming with trillions of microorganisms, like bacteria, fungi, and viruses. These invisible lives form an ecosystem known as the skin microbiome, which, like your gut microbiome, is a critical component of our health.

Our skin microbiome is an important part of the physical layer that protects you from damages from the outside world, and it works with other parts of your skin to fight infections, heal wounds, and control inflammation.

Through his research, Dr Pennino discovered Dermafixium, which is a beneficial extract from one of the good microbes on the healthy skin of children and adults and is deficient in individuals affected by skin disorders like Eczema. Importantly, this microbial strain of Lactobacillus behind Dermafixium lives specifically on human skin, unlike the other members in the same family that are normally found in the gut.

settings.main_heading: What is Dermafixium, and how does it help?

settings.sub_heading: Dermafixium prevents redness and skin damage provoked by irritant
settings.image_under_heading: Representative result of SLS induced erythema in 24 hours patch test
settings.image_under_desc: Dermafixium is a natural source of essential molecules and nutrients for the skin, consisting of short-chain fatty acids and microbial metabolites, that promote healthier skin when re-introduced onto the skin. Dr Pennino and The SkinBiome Co. team spent close to 10 years developing a highly effective formula for people affected by skin disorders. Our scientific data here strongly supports that our formulation can lead to visible skin improvement within one day of application.
